name: Touhou Theme [For New YT Layout]
description:
The original theme was made by Stargazer
Theme link: https://userstyles.org/styles/151269/touhou-theme

Let's say this is a remake for the new Youtube Layout
additional_info:
If you want the previous version, dont worry here is the link for that:
https://userstyles.org/styles/192946/touhou-theme-for-new-yt-layout-earlier-version

Before install this theme, please install Stylus and this theme only applies to Youtube

Update Log
v1.2.0 - Realised style
v1.4.6 - Modified colors
v1.5.1 - Changed background color
v1.6.1 - Redesigned Theme
